pages.text: The Glass Shield fully protects against a single attack, and then shatters. It regenerates after a cooldown period.

The Glass Shield supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Mending$(): Decreases the duration it takes for the curio to recharge$(br)$(l)Unbreaking$(): Grants a (small) chance to prevent the curio from shattering when blocking a hit
